00024 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 // Function: ComponentItem()
00026 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 ComponentItem::ComponentItem(QRectF const& size, QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00028                              QString const& instanceName, QString const& displayName,
00029                              QString const& description,
00030                              QMap<QString, QString> const& configurableElementValues,
00031                              QGraphicsItem *parent) :
00032 QGraphicsRectItem(parent), component_(component), name_(instanceName), nameLabel_(0), displayName_(displayName),
00033 description_(description), configurableValues_(configurableElementValues)
00034 {
00035     setFlag(ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00036     setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00037     setRect(size);
00038     setObjectName(instanceName);
00039 
00040     Q_ASSERT_X(component, "ComponentItem constructor",
00041         "Null component-pointer given as parameter");
00042 
00043     // Create the name label.
00044     nameLabel_ = new QGraphicsTextItem(instanceName, this);
00045     nameLabel_->setHtml("<center>"+instanceName+"</center>");
00046     QFont font = nameLabel_->font();
00047     font.setWeight(QFont::Bold);
00048     nameLabel_->setFont(font);
00049     nameLabel_->setTextWidth(rect().width());
00050     nameLabel_->setPos(-nameLabel_->boundingRect().width()/2, GridSize);
00051 
00052     connect(nameLabel_->document(), SIGNAL(contentsChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00053 }
00054 
00055 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 // Function: ~ComponentItem()
00057 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 ComponentItem::~ComponentItem()
00059 {
00060     emit destroyed(this);
00061 }
00062 
00063 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00064 // Function: updateComponent()
00065 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 void ComponentItem::updateComponent()
00067 {
00068     VLNV* vlnv = component_->getVlnv();
00069 
00070     // Set the tooltip.
00071     if (vlnv->isValid())
00072     {
00073         setToolTip("Vendor : " + vlnv->getVendor() + "\n" +
00074             "Library : " + vlnv->getLibrary() + "\n" +
00075             "Name : " + vlnv->getName() + "\n" +
00076             "Version : " + vlnv->getVersion());
00077     }
00078     else
00079     {
00080         setToolTip("Unpackaged component. No VLNV assigned!");
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 // Function: setName()
00086 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void ComponentItem::setName(QString const& name)
00088 {
00089     QString oldName = name_;
00090 
00091     // TODO: Make a base class for the diagrams.
00092     if (dynamic_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene()) == 0)
00093     {
00094         BlockDiagram* diagram = dynamic_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene());
00095         diagram->updateInstanceName(oldName, name);
00096     }
00097     else
00098     {
00099         EndpointDesignDiagram* diagram = dynamic_cast<EndpointDesignDiagram*>(scene());
00100         diagram->updateInstanceName(oldName, name);
00101     }
00102 
00103     name_ = name;
00104     updateNameLabel(name);
00105 
00106     emit contentChanged();
00107     emit nameChanged(name, oldName);
00108 }
00109

00196 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197 // Function: itemChange()
00198 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00199 QVariant ComponentItem::itemChange(GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant &value)
00200 {
00201     if (change == ItemPositionChange) {
00202         QPointF newPos = value.toPointF();
00203         return snapPointToGrid(newPos);
00204     }
00205     else if (change == ItemPositionHasChanged)
00206     {
00207         emit contentChanged();
00208     }
00209 
00210     return QGraphicsItem::itemChange(change, value);
00211 }

00219 }
